rules_text:
When Library Elder enters the battlefield, it studies. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it’s a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)[/i]
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
